Statute.Title: Physical Activity and Sport Act
Statute.OtherLangTitle: (Activité physique et le sport, Loi sur l’)

Minister.Text: Minister of Health in respect of physical activity and the Minister of State (Sport) in respect of sport (SI/2025-83)

CIF.Text: CIF, 2003, c. 2, other than s. 38, in force 15.06.2003 see SI/2003-129; s. 38 in force on assent 19.03.2003
CIF, 2003, c. 22, s. 279 in force on assent 07.11.2003

CIF, 2009, c. 23, s. 357 in force on assent 23.06.2009; s. 334 in force 17.10.2011 see SI/2011-87 [Note: the amendment provided for s. 357 took effect on the coming into force of par. 313(a) which is 31.12.2017 see SI/2018-1]
CIF, 2015, c. 3, s. 141 in force on assent 26.02.2015
